title: Suggestion for the champion mastery system - Mastery color overlays
body:
I figure this would really only work for master 5 or higher. It should also be a choice for the summoner if they want the overlay.
http://img05.deviantart.net/2e62/i/2016/310/0/3/darius_by_armand_anims-dank9jr.jpg?1

http://img09.deviantart.net/033f/i/2016/310/1/4/dunkmaster_darius_normal_loading_picture_by_armand_anims-dank7yd.jpg

http://img12.deviantart.net/f9ee/i/2016/310/2/f/riven_norm_by_armand_anims-dank88f.jpg

http://img06.deviantart.net/e43e/i/2016/310/7/e/riven_by_armand_anims-dank887.jpg

For every champion :D

replies.body: That looks hideous! I'd want to demote myself back to Level 3 if I had to see that every loading screen!
Well it would be a choice to have it selected. so you wouldn't :o
Took alot of time to get there ^~^
I feel when they match it makes the mastery stand out more. o.o
